## Instructions

Go to the discussion board for this module and post something answering these questions:

* Which part of the _'R Experience'_ so far did you find the most exciting?
* Which part of the _'R Experience'_ so far did you find the most frustrating/confusing?
* What topic(s) related to R do you want to see covered in this course?

You are also welcome to comment on other people's posts.

##Assessments check-list
The assessment for this module is based on:

* Your discussion contribution as described in the discussion document
* Your completion of the Datacamp courses assigned for this module
